reactions.name: Parry
reactions.text: The NPC adds +{pb} to its AC against one attack that would hit it.

reactions.name: Retaliate
reactions.text: When hit by a creature within 5 ft., the NPC makes one melee attack against that creature.

reactions.name: Protective Prayer
reactions.text: When a creature the NPC can see within 30 ft. is hit, the NPC adds +{pb} to that creature's AC against the triggering attack.

reactions.name: Arcane Shield
reactions.text: When the NPC is hit by an attack, it gains +{pb} AC against that attack, potentially causing it to miss.

reactions.name: Slip Away
reactions.text: When a creature misses the NPC with a melee attack, the NPC can move up to 10 ft. without provoking opportunity attacks.
